invalid_date.english: Sorry. We couldn't understand your date. Please type a correct date in the following format -> 31-08 16:24

invalid_multiple_choice.english: Sorry. We couldn't understand your answer. Please type all the letters that apply (ex. abc).

invalid_multiple_none_choice.english: Sorry. You cannot choose "none of these" and another answer. Please choose only "none of these" or the other options (ex1. abc, ex2. h).

invalid_single_choice.english: Sorry. We couldn't understand your answer. Please type only one letter (ex. a).

invalid_location.english: Sorry. It looks like we couldn't find that location. Please select a location by tapping the plus button, select "location," and drop a pin where the accident happened.
